Text:
Sunblock: 
Trevligt att se att folk är med på en betalsida och SNOR film därifrån för att kunna lägga upp här.
Lite dyrt i längden för dig kanske, men fin gratisreklam för oss;-)
//MovieCom(.)se

First:
What is it im stealing?. The movies in first place is not urs/or (www-moviecom-se) in any way or form right?.

Secound:
If i buy something and download to my comp or what ever is do, its up to me what i do next with it. I dont see how this is stealing.

Third:
Its this how moviecom calling there customers by thiefs?.

Som sagt trevligt med idioter som betalar för att ge gratis saker till andra ;-)  Keep it up! :-D
BTW, lycka till med din sida, på vår bekostnad då.

Its good to see how realy moviecom treat there paying customers. Calling them idiot and thieves.

What homepage do i have? Im a uploader for a homepages and i dont see what this have anything to do with u or moviecom. Do u think ur moives makes a hole homepages?. Take a look here: http://thepiratebay.org/user/Sunblock./ our files is like 0.00001% of what i share. Some ppl wants swedish subs and give em that and im paying for it so the problem is?. What i do next is my business, You dont know what i get in return do u?. So dont call ur paying customers idiot before even know what u talking about.

If u dont like ppl shareing "ur subed movies" you should not selling them in first place.

At least you could give cred to them who has worked with the film?
It's just good manners to do so.

So.....

and i should bean give a cred for paying them and give them free advertising?. Dont i show my manners/support by that?.

so....

Ja tyvärr finns det även idioter bland våra medlemmar - som synes. Ibland rikspuckon faktiskt.

Lycka till med din sida med 12 medlemmar och allt ;-) (För namnet sharedump har väl inte skrivit in sig självt i vår torrentfil va? ;-) )

What part did u understan? In "im a uploader" and i advertising there server(s) like 1000000 other ppl doing here.  Your server hade 10000 members after 2 days of opening i guess.

You realy are a sade case m8, You are so pissed that i share ur files for free which im not doing anything wrong in, as i pay for them. This is the real reason and its not hard to see.

I was to told my pals to get there swedish subed movies them self at your page to support it. But i see now that this hade bean a BIG misstake puhh. But i give a big thanx to u to show the truth.

But what ever this conversation boring me out totaly. Becasue its leads no where. As long i didnt do anything wrong its pointless to go on.

Take care

Btw you hade only need to ask me nice not to share them and i hade not do it. All things can be solved by civilize talk not insult your paying customers for absolutely no reason at all.

Maybe u learn something by this, But i got my doubts.

You DONT steal other sites torrents.
PERIOD.

Thats just truly sad hahaha!
Pay for torrents and then share them LOL!!!
Wow, your mama must be so proud! ,-))

what im stealing?. You dont even know how it works still you running a pay server. lol

I download ur movie from ur tracker and i have payed for it. How is this stealing?. Do i use your tracker? Do i use ur torrent as a external torrent?.

how is this ur torrent? how is this ur movie? u  sub (c) movies and selling them simple as that nothing is urs.

So u saying that every download from here should not be shared because its stealing?..lol ur realy are a sade case...this is what its all about. Maybe u can get more members from ur page to comment here maybe i will care..just maybe.

Like i sade pointless....take care.... last comment.
Ja inte  kommer jag ansluta mig till moviecom, tänk om jag delar ut ngt av misstag :)
"snor" vad snackar ni för skit moviecom? Killen lägger ut film som alla andra...haha synd om er då... har ni ont om pengar? haha
